name: Sceptile
author: hatachu
flavor_text: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrier
ancient_trait.effect: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card (excluding Pokémon Tools and Stadium cards), prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Power Poison
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy attached to this Pokémon. Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
